valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 5 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 6 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Viking 1007 expected Fisher 1006 by midday tomorrow. New low expected Fair Isle 999 by same time. Low German Bight 1006 losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
Cyclonic 4 to 6, occasionally 7, becoming easterly or southeasterly 5 to 7 later, perhaps gale 8 later in south.
Sea state
Moderate, occasionally rough at first.
Weather
Squally snow showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally very poor.

Biscay.text:
Wind
In north, northerly backing southwesterly later, 4 to 6. In south, cyclonic 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first, becoming variable 3 or 4 later.
Sea state
In north, slight or moderate, but moderate or rough. in south, smooth or slight in southeast, otherwise moderate or rough, occasionally very rough, becoming slight or moderate later.
Weather
In north, wintry showers, rain later. In south, rain or showers.
Visibility
In north, good, occasionally poor. In south, good, occasionally moderate.
